name: asbestos-projects-nys
description: Search active abatement projects in New York State

scripts.copy-assets: copyfiles -u 2 src/static/*.css dist/css && copyfiles -u 2 src/static/index.html src/static/sw.js src/static/new-york.pmtiles dist && copyfiles output.json dist
scripts.build:client: mkdir -p dist/js && browserify src/site/site.ts -p [ tsify ] -o dist/js/site.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run copy-assets
scripts.refresh-data: npm run scrape && npm run geocode && cp output.json dist/data.json

author: Soeren Roerden
